about_the_game:
An unlikely group has been formed with the mission of defeating a new dark force corrupting the world. Maximilian, a beloved hero coming from a noble family, Liz, a legendary thief wanted in multiple countries and The Shadow, an enigmatic being that everyone thought was the origin of the corruption.

But something bad has happened... They lost all their equipment! Now they must gear up again in order to face the great challeges ahead.


After clearing an area you will find a chest that will offer you a choice between three pieces of equipment of varying rarity to add to your inventory when opened. Each piece is part of a set and equipping enough pieces of a set unlocks powerful passive abilities. Combine different set abilities or focus on getting one to its highest level to make the strongest build you can!


In some areas you will find a skill book that will grant you a skill point when opened, unlocking a new level of the skill tree. After unlocking it, you can acquire one of the three skills of that level. Skills can offer you general utility, an increase in power or make one specific build go beyond its limits and each level of the tree grants masteries more powerful than the previous ones.

You will need a build that combines synergistic pieces of equipment with the apropiate skills to face the biggest challenges of this adventure: the bosses.

At the end of each region a boss will try to stop you from completing this quest. This powerful enemies have special abilities and will test the build you have been creating until now, so make the right choices at every step of your journey to make sure no one will stand in your way!

name: Overlooting

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or AMD Radeon R7 240
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4690
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R9 270
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Adapt your strategy to a skill tree that changes every run, combine pieces of equipment to form powerful synergies and create a game-changing build capable of defeating the bosses that will try to stop you. In this Inventory Management Roguelike two games never feel the same!
